sequences.rationale: Full-width hero with video background, heading, description, and CTA. This is a classic hero block pattern. The video background is a key feature. An author would use a Hero block with video support rather than default content.

sequences.rationale: Tabbed interface with 6 tabs (People, Planet, Prosperity, Infrastructure, Digital, Cross-Cutting Areas), each containing card carousels.
